channel.title: Shop
channel.description: [B][I][U]hi guys, i need help with my rsps server its a project insanity and i need help with my shops whenever i change place of shops like mage range shops and i put at my home edge and when i compile and rerun my server ok after we login we cant see theses please someone help me! [SIZE=5]my source and client its Solitude[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]skype:helprsps[/SIZE][/U][/I][/B]
